hackathon-description-text: Join us on the grounds of the festival in beautiful Villa Belparc. If you participate in the challenge, you are entitled to a VIP wristband for the festival, among other prizes for "best hacks".
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=A O ELLIOTS VÄG 10, 413 11 Göteborg, Sweden
hackathon-location-address: A O ELLIOTS VÄG 10, 413 11 Göteborg, Sweden
hackathon-description-header: #wowhack2 is here! Parlophone, Spotify, and friends bring you a two-day hack competition on the grounds of the festival in beautiful Villa Belparc.
